actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the proposed toll increases on the St. Lawrence Seaway are excessive and should not be adopted.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the proposed toll increases on the Saint Lawrence Seaway should not be adopted and that negotiations on new tolls should be reopened, and if any toll increases are necessary, such increases should be minimal.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the proposed toll increases on the St. Lawrence Seaway are excessive and should not be adopted.
